kw.name: Open my Browser
kw.doc: 開啟瀏覽器並略過網頁驗證過期問題

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: RegistTest
kw.arg: My philosophy of life is that if we make up our mind what we are going to make of our lives, then work hard toward that goal, we never lose – somehow we win out.
kw.doc: 進行網頁註冊功能驗證,包含填寫姓名,性別,嗜好,任職單位,帳號,密碼,連絡電話,備註訊息,最後驗證註冊訊息是否出現在網頁尾端

kw.name: Enter First Name
kw.doc: 輸入名子

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Enter Last Name
kw.doc: 輸入姓氏

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Select Gender
kw.doc: 選擇性別(單選紐)

kw.name: Select Radio Button
kw.doc: Sets the radio button group ``group_name`` to ``value``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Select Hobby
kw.doc: 選擇興趣(列表框)

kw.name: Select From List By Label
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``labels``.

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'My philosophy of life is that if we make up our mind what we are going to make of our lives, then work hard toward that goal, we never lose – somehow we win out.' into text field 'xpath://textarea[@id='exampleFormControlTextarea1']'.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Press Submit
kw.doc: 點擊註冊按鈕

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Verify Successful Registion
kw.doc: 驗證註冊成功,先將網頁捲動置尾端,驗證出現註冊成功訊息,並且網頁尾端表格出現姓名,任職單位,信箱,連絡電話等對應註冊訊息

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: RegistTest
kw.arg: A man watches his pear tree, day after day, impatient for the ripening of the fruit. Let him attempt to force the process, and he may spoil both the fruit and tree. But let him patiently wait, and the ripe pear, at length, falls into his lap.
